root.name: Kart Krashers
root.description: OverviewKart Krashers is a driving game developed and published by Big John Games for the DSiWare and 3DSWare platforms.GameplayKart Krashers is a single player only driving game which contains a circuit of 10 stages to advance through. Each stage of the circuit consists of 3 events, each of which is a different objective. In order to unlock more stages players must earn a certain number of Golden Wheels which can be obtained by completing the three objectives in each stage.
